resources.string: \nYou\'re now connected to Office 365. Tap the button below to send a message from your account using the Office 365 SDK.\n
\nCheck your inbox, you have a new message :)
\nSorry, can\'t connect to Office 365.\nHint: Check logcat for details.
\nSorry, can\'t find the mail service.\nHint: Check logcat for details.
\nSorry, can\'t send the email.\nHint: Check logcat for details.
Error finding mail service\nCheck logcat for details
The client ID or redirect URI is not valid. Enter a valid client ID and redirect URI in the Constants.java file and run again
Please take a few minutes to learn about the features of the app
Swipe to switch between Announcements, Events and Personal Information
You can login with your existing university email, using K-Number@kcl.ac.uk
You can click on each announcement to see more details
You can click on dates to see more details about events on that day
You can click on settings tab to see personal information and application details
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
Please login with a King\'s College London Account.

Contact the Department of Informatics 
 
Contacting academic members of staff 
Please use our People section to find contact details for a specific person.

Department of Informatics 
King\’s College London 
Strand Campus 
Bush House 
30 Aldwych London 
WC2B 4BG

For detailed information about the application procedure, how to apply, academic / language requirements and documentation to be included, please refer to the Admissions Office. 
If you have an enquiry about our programmes and have not submitted an application, you can contact the relevant admissions team directly: 
Prospective undergraduate (BSc) students: 
Write: Complete our Enquiry form 
Tel: 020 7848 7517 
 
If you have already submitted an application, please direct any queries about your application to the team via King’s Apply, the online portal, directly so that we can keep an accurate record of your correspondence. 
 
- Log into your portal account at https://apply.kcl.ac.uk 
 
- Click through to the programme that you are trying to access (the links will be under the section called ‘Current applications’). If you’ve applied to more than one programme, click through to the relevant one. 
 
 Choose ‘Send King’s a Message’ from the left hand menu and you will be able to type a message to the admissions team to ask for assistance. You can also attach files of any relevant documents, results etc.

King\’s students should log onto King\’s CareerConnect to book appointments with the Careers team, reserve a place at Careers events, find an internship, and browse job opportunities. 
 
If you are interested in advertising an opportunity to our students on King’s CareerConnect, please see here. 
Degree certificate requests 
These are dealt with by Boards and Awards.

If an employer requires a factual reference from King’s College London stating your dates of attendance and qualifications obtained, the transcripts office can produce this: transcripts@kcl.ac.uk. \nIf the employer requests a character reference, you should request this from your personal tutor. \n
Requests for academic transcripts should go to the Transcripts webpage. \nWebsite enquiries \nFor all website enquiries, contact Lily Brinn.
